exception.name: ErrorDeviceIsInitialized
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the SE API function initilize has already been invoked before.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorDeviceIsInitialized that is thrown if the SE API function initilize has already been invoked before.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when attempting to initialize an already initialized device
specification.applicability: Device initialization when device already initialized
